restorePool.description: The vendor pool will be restored. Vendor questionnaires will be available.

editPool.title: Change questionnaire
editPool.description: If you change the questionnaire, vendors will lose the status of accredited in the pool. To restore the status, participants must submit applications taking into account the changes made. Changes can be undone, in this case the status of accreditation of participants will remain the same.
